name: Venom

abilities.name: Claws / Bite
abilities.details: Brutal attacks using claws, teeth, and symbiote mass.

abilities.name: Symbiote Pull
abilities.details: Launches a tendril that pulls an enemy towards Venom.

abilities.name: Tendril Lunge
abilities.details: Lunges forward, damaging the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Symbiote Slam
abilities.details: Slams the ground with symbiote mass, damaging and disrupting enemies.

ultimate.name: Maximum Venom
ultimate.effect: Enters berserk state for 10s: Increased size, significantly increased damage, damage resistance, and faster movement.
ultimate.details: Lethal protector mode fully engaged, enhancing all attributes.

passives.name: Symbiote Healing
passives.details: Regenerates health over time when not taking damage. Takes increased damage from fire-based attacks.

passives.name: Wall Crawling
passives.details: Can cling to and climb surfaces.

lore: An alien symbiote bonded with a host (originally Spider-Man, most famously Eddie Brock). Venom possesses superhuman strength, durability, shapeshifting tendrils, and regenerative healing, often acting as a violent anti-hero.
